class.name: ir.maatisa.libs.complex.maatisasp
class.comment: Maatisa ScaleFont [sp] Library Ver1.00 Written by Mohsen Torabi @ Maatisa SoftWare Development Group(SWDG) You can set text size of any view in this library. More Info: Telegram|https://t.me/maatisa_swdg Example: Sub Globals Dim msp1 As MaatisaSP End Sub Sub Activity_Create(FirstTime As Boolean) msp1.Initialize(Activity.Width) 'Initialize lib object with width of your Activity Dim lbl As Label lbl.Initialize("") lbl.Text = $"Maatisa ScaleFont [sp] Library${CRLF}Written by Mohsen Torabi"$ lbl.Gravity = Gravity.CENTER_HORIZONTAL + Gravity.CENTER_VERTICAL lbl.SingleLine = False lbl.Textsize = msp1.sp(15) 'Set best font size to Label Activity.AddView(lbl , 0 , 0 , 100%x , 10%y) Log(msp1.About) End Sub

class.name: ir.maatisa.libs.complex.maatisacustomtoast
class.comment: Maatisa Custom Toast Library Ver1.00 Written by Mohsen Torabi @ Maatisa SoftWare Development Group(SWDG) Shows a custom toast message as you need. More Info: Telegram|https://t.me/maatisa_swdg Example: Sub Globals Dim mct1 As MaatisaCustomToast End Sub Sub Activity_Create(FirstTime As Boolean) mct1.Initialize("Welcome to Maatisa products", Typeface.DEFAULT_BOLD, Colors.Black, 16, Colors.Yellow, 20dip) mct1.Show("" , True) End Sub

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: txtDefault - Set Default Text to show in toast msg if you leave empty "newText" string in "Show" Methode. txtTypeface - Set your custom Typeface. txtColor - Set text color. txtSize - Set text size. backColor - Set custom toast background color. cRadius - Set corner radius of toast background rect. in dip like 20dip mct1.Initialize("Welcome to Maatisa products", Typeface.DEFAULT_BOLD, Colors.Black, 16, Colors.Yellow, 20dip)

method.name: _show
method.comment: newText - Set Text to show in toast msg if you leave this empty "defaultText" string will be REPLACED. LongDuration - Set Duration of toast. True is Long mct1.Show("Welcome" , True)
